com.software.reuze

Class ga_ShapeCurve

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.ga_a_Shape
      • com.software.reuze.ga_ShapeCurve
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ga_ShapeCurve
extends ga_a_Shape
    A bezier curve implementation. The curve is defined by a start point, an end point and two control points that it will tend towards. This is implementation is fixed segmenting meaning it doesn't scale too well.
    Author:
    kevin
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
